name: autojoy
description: Automatically update emulators and games input settings based on what's connected to your computer!

scripts.start: cross-env AUTOJOY_ENV=dev run-p pages:dev backend:dev main:dev electron:start
scripts.pack: cross-env run-s pages:build backend:prod main:prod electron:pack
scripts.dist: cross-env run-s pages:build backend:prod main:prod electron:dist
scripts.backend:dev: esbuild src/autojoy-backend/index.mjs    --banner:js="import { createRequire } from 'module'; const require = createRequire(import.meta.url);" --bundle --platform=node --format=esm --target=node20 --external:@kmamal/sdl --external:*.node --outfile=src/dist/autojoy-backend.js --watch
scripts.backend:prod: esbuild src/autojoy-backend/index.mjs    --banner:js="import { createRequire } from 'module'; const require = createRequire(import.meta.url);" --bundle --platform=node --format=esm --target=node20 --external:@kmamal/sdl --external:*.node --outfile=src/dist/autojoy-backend.js --minify
scripts.main:dev: esbuild src/main/index.js    --banner:js="import { createRequire } from 'module'; const require = createRequire(import.meta.url);" --bundle --platform=node --format=esm --target=node20 --external:electron --external:*.node --outfile=src/dist/main.js --watch
scripts.main:prod: esbuild src/main/index.js   --banner:js="import { createRequire } from 'module'; const require = createRequire(import.meta.url);"  --bundle --platform=node --format=esm --target=node20 --external:electron --external:*.node --outfile=src/dist/main.js --minify

author: Jhonny Michel <jhonnymichel@outlook.com>
